fw.name: TopologicalOperatorsLight
fw.footer: Copyright © 1999-2011, Dassault Systèmes. All rights reserved.

class.name: CATDistanceMinBodyBody
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the minimum distance between two bodies.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the computed minimum distance between the two bodies.

method.name: GetPointComputationMode
method.abstract: Returns the computation mode (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetPoints
method.abstract: Returns the points realizing the minimum distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: GetSupportCells
method.abstract: Returns the cells on which are the points realizing the minimum distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: ReplaceBody
method.abstract: Defines another computation (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Computes the distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetDistanceMax
method.abstract: Defines a maximum distance between the two bodies (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

method.name: SetPointComputationMode
method.abstract: Asks for the computation of the points realizing the minimum distance (<tt>ADVANCED</tt> mode).

constructor.name: CATEuclidianDistanceTool
constructor.abstract: Constructs the object for the euclidean computation.

class.name: CATExtrapolParallelTool
class.abstract: Class defining the parallel computation.

method.name: GetData
method.abstract: Retrieves the topological data associated with <tt>this</tt> tool.

method.name: GetDistanceTool
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of computation.

method.name: GetExtrapInfo
method.abstract: Returns the relimitation type.

method.name: GetFactory
method.abstract: Retrieves the factory that creates the resulting body.

method.name: GetSupport
method.abstract: Retrieves the skin body on which the parallel is computed.

class.name: CATGeoToTopOperator
class.abstract: Base abstract class of the operators that create topology from geometry.

method.name: GetReport
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the topological journal associated with <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance for assembling the geometry.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance for assembling the geometry.

constructor.name: CATGeodesicDistanceTool
constructor.abstract: Constructs the object for the geodesic computation.

class.name: CATHybAssemble
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that assembles two bodies.

method.name: GetSuppressBody
method.abstract: Retrieves the suppressed cells in a body.

method.name: GetSuppressMode
method.abstract: Returns the suppress mode.

method.name: SetCellsToMerge
method.abstract: Specifies a list of cells to be merged in a local join.

method.name: SetSuppressMode
method.abstract: Activates suppress mode : in the case of invalid cells, operator does a second pass after having removed them.

class.name: CATHybBoolean
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that performs Boolean operations on two bodies.

method.name: SetSelectedCells
method.abstract: Specifies the cells to be kept and removed in the operation.

class.name: CATHybBoundary
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that computes the boundary of a wire or a shell.

class.name: CATHybDisconnect
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that inserts vertices in a wire or skin body, or inserts edges in a skin body.

method.name: GetCorrespondingPackNumber
method.abstract: Returns the rank of a created cell.

method.name: GetCorrespondingSide
method.abstract: Returns the location of the created cell.

method.name: GetQueryMode
method.abstract: Returns the state of the query mode.

method.name: SetQueryMode
method.abstract: Activates the query mode.

class.name: CATHybIntersect
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that intersects two bodies.

method.name: SetFirstDomainToIntersect
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the first body must be intersected.

method.name: SetSecondDomainToIntersect
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the second body must be intersected.

class.name: CATHybOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operators operating with surfacic and wireframe entities.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the state of the resulting body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting CATBody of <tt>this</tt> CATHybOperator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATHybOperatorImp
class.abstract: Class defining the operators operating with surfacic and wireframe entities.

method.name: GetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Returns the state of the resulting body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting CATBody of <tt>this</tt> CATHybOperator.

method.name: GetTolerance
method.abstract: Returns the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetFreezeMode
method.abstract: Defines the state of the resulting body.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into acccount by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATHybProject
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that projects a body on another one.

method.name: GetDistance
method.abstract: Returns the maximum distance of projection for a given domain of the resulting body.

method.name: SetDomainSupport
method.abstract: Defines on which domain of the second body the projection is done.

method.name: SetDomainToProject
method.abstract: Defines which domain of the first body must be projected.

method.name: SetMaxDistanceValue
method.abstract: Specify a maximum distance for the solution(s) to be kept.

class.name: CATHybSplit
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that splits two bodies.

method.name: GetKeepHalfSpaceMode
method.abstract: Queries whether ‘Keep elements in half space’ mode is activated or not.

method.name: GetSingleExtrapolMode
method.abstract: Queries whether ‘keep only the no intersecting solutions of extrapolated cuttings’ mode is activated or not.

method.name: SetKeepHalfSpaceMode
method.abstract: Sets or unsets the ‘Keep elements in half space’ mode.

method.name: SetSingleExtrapolMode
method.abstract: Sets or unsets the ‘keep only the no intersecting solutions of extrapolated cuttings’ mode.

class.name: CATHybTrim
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that trims two bodies.

class.name: CATLayDownOperator
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that projects a body onto another one referred to as the support and returns a solution only if the distance is lower than the factory resolution.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the projected body or the initial body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

class.name: CATSketchGeodesic
class.abstract: Class defining the topological operator that creates a geodesic curve from a point and a direction.

method.name: ChangeLength
method.abstract: Replaces the length specified in the <tt>CATCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the point specified in the <tt>CATCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangePoint
method.abstract: Replaces the point and support specified in the <tt>CATCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangeSupport
method.abstract: Replaces the support specified in the <tt>CATCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: ChangeTangent
method.abstract: Replaces the tangent specified in the <tt>CATCreateGeodesicPointDir</tt> global function.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs the operator.

class.name: CATSketchOperators
class.abstract: Parent class of CATSketchGeodesic.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Retrieve the geodesic curve.

method.name: GetWire
method.abstract: Retrieves the created wire.

class.name: CATSolidPrimitive
class.abstract: Base class for the operators that create basic topological primitives.

method.name: GetFactory
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the factory of the geometry used in <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetReport
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the journal.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns a pointer to the resulting body created by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATSolidSphere
class.abstract: Class defining the operator to create a topological sphere.

class.name: CATTopExtrapolWireOnShell
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that computes the extrapolation of a wire on a skin body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

method.name: RunOperator
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopGeodesicPtPt
class.abstract: Class defining the operator that creates a geodesic line from two points.

method.name: GetParam
method.abstract: Retrieves the curve parameters.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetLength
method.abstract: Adds a given length at the extremities of the line.

method.name: SetParam
method.abstract: Re-specifies the curve parameters.

method.name: SetTolerance
method.abstract: Defines the tolerance of the geometrically coincident elements to be taken into account by <tt>this</tt> operator on start and end points.

class.name: CATTopParallel
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that computes a wire parallel to another one on a skin body.

method.name: GetResult
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the resulting body.

class.name: CATTopSkin
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that creates a skin body from one surface.

method.name: ForceSkinClosureInU
method.abstract: Asks for the closure of the skin in the first surface direction.

method.name: ForceSkinClosureInV
method.abstract: Asks for the closure of the skin in the second surface direction.

method.name: GetLimits
method.abstract: Retrieves the limits on the surface taken into account by <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: GetShell
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the shell of the resulting skin body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

method.name: SetInternalLoop
method.abstract: Defines an internal loop in the face of a skin body.

method.name: SetLimits
method.abstract: Defines limits on the surface to be taken into account by <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopVertex
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that creates a point body from one point.

method.name: GetVertex
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the vertex of the resulting point body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

class.name: CATTopWire
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that creates a wire body from one or several curves.

method.name: ForceWireClosure
method.abstract: Asks for the closure of the wire.

method.name: GetWire
method.abstract: Returns the pointer to the wire of the resulting body.

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.

function.name: CATCreateDistanceMinTopo
function.abstract: Creates an operator for computing the minimum distance between two CATBody.

function.name: CATCreateGeodesicPointDir
function.abstract: Creates a CATSketchGeodesic operator that computes the geodesic on a support from a start point, a direction and a length.

function.name: CATCreateNewTopAssemble
function.abstract: Constructs a CATHybOperator that assembles bodies.

function.name: CATCreateRemoveFacesInShell
function.abstract: Creates an operator to build a new shell from an initial shell and a list of faces to remove.

function.name: CATCreateTopAssemble
function.abstract: Constructs a CATHybOperator that assembles bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopBoundary
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a piece of boundary of a CATShell or a CATWire.

function.name: CATCreateTopDisconnect
function.abstract: Creates the operator to insert vertices in a wire or skin body, or to insert edges in a skin body.

function.name: CATCreateTopDisconnectShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that disconnects a CATShell.

function.name: CATCreateTopDisconnectWire
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that disconnects a CATWire.

function.name: CATCreateTopEuclidianDistanceTool
function.abstract: Constructs the object for the euclidean computation.

function.name: CATCreateTopExtrapolWireOnShell
function.abstract: Creates a CATExtrapolWireOnShell operator that computes the extrapolation of a wire on a shell.

function.name: CATCreateTopGeodesicDistanceTool
function.abstract: Constructs the object for the geodesic computation.

function.name: CATCreateTopIntersect
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that intersects two bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopLayDown
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that projects a body onto another one referred to as the support and returns a solution.

function.name: CATCreateTopNewSplitShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopNewSplitShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopNewSplitWire
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATWire domain by a CATShell,a CATWire or a CATVertexInVolume domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopParallel
function.abstract: Creates a CATTopParallel operator that computes a wire parallel (according to a given law) to another one on a shell.

function.name: CATCreateTopProject
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that projects a domain on a domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSkin
function.abstract: Creates an operator to build a skin body on one surface.

function.name: CATCreateTopSkin
function.abstract: Creates an operator to build a skin body from several curves on the same surface.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplit
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits one body by another one.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitOnSupport
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits one body by another one on a support context.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitShellWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitShellWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitShellWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitWire
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATWire domain by a CATShell,a CATWire or a CATVertexInVolume domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopSplitWireWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATWire domain by a CATShell,a CATWire or a CATVertexInVolume domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrim
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that mutually trims two bodies.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimOnSupport
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that mutually trims two bodies on a support context.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimShell
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that splits a CATShell domain by a CATShell or a CATWire domain.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimShellWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that trims two CATShell domains.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimShellWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that trims two CATShell domains.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimWire
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that trims two CATWire domains.

function.name: CATCreateTopTrimWireWithKeepRemove
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that trims two CATWire domains.

function.name: CATCreateTopVertex
function.abstract: Creates an operator to build a point body from one point.

function.name: CATCreateTopWire
function.abstract: Creates an operator to build a wire body from several curves.

function.name: CATTopCreateSolidSphere
function.abstract: Constructs an operator that creates a topological sphere.

function.name: CreateExtrapolParallelTool
function.abstract: Creates a parallel computation definition.

class.name: CATRemoveFacesInShell
class.abstract: Class representing the operator that creates a shell body from a list of faces Moreover, the operator allows the faces to have inside loops (holes).

method.name: Run
method.abstract: Runs <tt>this</tt> operator.
